name: writeMultipleBlocks(requestFlags:blockRange:dataBlocks:completionHandler:)
desc: Sends the Write Multiple Blocks command (0x24 command code), as defined in the ISO 15693-3 specification, to the tag.Required.
declaration:
func writeMultipleBlocks(requestFlags flags: NFCISO15693RequestFlag, 
              blockRange: NSRange, 
              dataBlocks: [Data], 
       completionHandler: @escaping (Error?) -> Void)
